entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:27 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow before morning. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming east 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
